    Huawei Annual Report

    2024 Annual Report

    In 2024, the entire team at Huawei banded together to tackle a wide range of external challenges, while further improving product quality, operations quality, and operational efficiency. Our performance was in line with forecast. We'd like to thank our customers around the world for your ongoing trust. Our thanks also go to our suppliers, partners, and the developer community for working together with us, and to consumers for your affirmation and support. And of course, we want to thank the entire Huawei team for all your hard work, and your families and loved ones for their unwavering support.
